translations: n.（墨西哥的）传统圣诞纸灯（luminaria 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Horsemen rode their steeds through flames in the annual "Luminarias" purification festival in the village of San Bartolome de los Pinares in central Spain on the eve of St Anthony's Day on January 16.
sentences.translation: 1月16日，圣安东尼节前夕，在西班牙中部圣巴多罗梅小镇举行的年度“火焰”净化节上，骑手骑马冲过火焰。
